sn13.5:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso mahapathaviya satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhipeyya.
sn13.5:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram, ya va satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhitta ya va mahapathavi”ti?
sn13.5:2.3: Neva satimam kalam upenti na sahassimam kalam upenti na satasahassimam kalam upenti mahapathavim upanidhaya satta kolatthimattiyo gulika upanikkhitta”ti.
